channel.title: When i log in someone else can log in as my name with a space?
channel.description:
when i log in my name Josh someone else will go and sign in as josh (space) and will sign it i want to make it so that when they try to use the same name it will say invalid username or password.
THIS IS WHAT I MEAN CAN U HELP ME [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2uo3ybm.jpg[/img][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2009, 03:32:17 pm[/size][hr]helpp??
